title: what the name of three fonts
content:
Help me please, Thanks

Font: 

 vice hand 2, WolgastScript and mathilde

comments.content:
1. El gran camino: Joebob Graphics/VinceHandIITRIAL  
 [http://www.dafont.com/vince-hand-2-trial.font?text=El+gran+camino](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200257/http:/www.dafont.com/vince-hand-2-trial.font?text=El+gran+camino)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200257im_/http:/typophile.com/files/elgran1_4309.jpg)
  
2. En la sociedad: Wolgast, CAT/WolgastScript [http://www.proexplus.com/font-file/wolgastscript.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200257/http:/www.proexplus.com/font-file/wolgastscript.font)
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200257im_/http:/typophile.com/files/enlasoc1_5745.jpg)
  
3. A quien: /Batchelor, Lee/Mathilde [http://www.dafont.com/mathilde.font?text=A+quien+el](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200257/http:/www.dafont.com/mathilde.font?text=A+quien+el)
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200257im_/http:/typophile.com/files/aquien1_5592.jpg)

2. **[Wolgast Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200257/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Wolgast%20Script%20-%20Regular&fid=09d0020efb1cf7267dd2a4046705c933&fsize=60&text=En%20la%20sociedad&wrap=2)** free font by Peter Wiegel

PS: Oh I see what you are doing Dick Pape! :)  
You post the first id quickly to be the first to answer and then edit this message to add the rest ids ;)  
I have to admit this is very effective... he he  
Next time I'll first post an empty message and then start to search for the actual id :)

Ah, the competitive spirit is alive and well...  
I often edit my posts to clean up errors etc. and preface the revised post with the word EDITED, but the speed demons have almost always posted before I chip in. So my post rarely is first in line.  
Don
